mapper.select: SELECT REQ_DEPT_CD , PRDLN_CD , KWD_SPR , SCRNG_SPR , SCRNG_SPR AS ORG_SCRNG_SPR , KWD_NM , KWD_NM AS ORG_KWD_NM , SYN_NM , RNG , SCR , USE_YN , EMP_NO , (SELECT NM FROM PI_EMP B WHERE B.EMP_NO = A.EMP_NO) AS USER_NM , REG_DT , '0' AS CHK_DEL FROM TM_ANLYS_STD A WHERE REQ_DEPT_CD = #{req_dept_cd} AND PRDLN_CD = #{prdln_cd} AND KWD_SPR = #{kwd_spr} ORDER BY KWD_NM
